recommendations: Omar Maner “Yogesh was one my students at KJSIM who underwent GDPI training during May 2021. Apart from his academics and certifications, his CV is enriched with a lot of corporate exposure in the form of corporate work experience, internships, specifically the summer one, and various other live projects. His involvement in various positions of responsibilities as part of different committees in KJSIM and his participation in co-curricular activities makes him an all round and well developed personality, which reflected in the GDPI training and evaluation process. I am confident that he will make the grade for any reputed corporate during the initial phases of his final placement process and I wish him the very best for the same. ”

Rama Bhandare “I have known Yogesh in capacity as a senior member of corporate relations and Placement team at K J Somaiya Institute of Management. We have worked closely for more than a year and I can confidently say Yogesh is an extremely dependent team player who is always up for new challenges and works hard to achieve his goals. He is also a very passionate and kind person working with a great sense of empathy while dealing with all stakeholders. I wish him the very best for the coming future and can confidently say he will be asset to any organization he chooses to join in future!”
